title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 
(Leader and Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications) 
Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (leader minister environment climate communications) order 2023

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 2. Each of the following persons particulars of each of whose address
text_raw:
2. Each of the following persons particulars of each of whose address 
have been deposited at the office of the Department of the Environment, 
Climate and Communications, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the 
Minister of the Government who is the leader of a political party registered in 
the Register of Political Parties and Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications with effect from 17 December 2022: 

(a) 

John McDonald; 

(b) Paul Kenny; 

(c) Edel Hackett. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

21 February, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 24th February, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [85] 3
